txt.en: The trolls of Mordor and Minas Morgul that turned to stone in North Ithilien now serve as an unexpected source of a valuable moss.
'This is just enough! You have my thanks, [placeholder].\n\n'I wonder what the Dark Lord would think if he knew his own trolls were of great aid to the healers of Gondor!'
Ereblen can be found in Henneth Annûn.\n\nYou have gathered a suitable amount of moss from the sun-touched trolls and should now deliver it to Ereblen.

'Do you remember the trolls we found in the wilds of Ithilien, [placeholder]? The ones that had turned to stone?

'Some of our company have since returned to the sites where you discovered them, and they all appear to have encouraged the growth of a peculiar moss upon them! We harvested a small amount and were able to extract it into a healing salve.

'It is unlike any of the mosses we have encountered in Ithilien... could a troll from the Dead City truly give way to something so helpful to my kinsmen?

'Seek out the sun-touched trolls, my friend, and scrape the moss from them. Do not harvest it all - for I am certain we shall have further use of it in the coming days.'
Scraped moss from sun-touched Morgul-trolls in North Ithilien ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Sun-touched Morgul-trolls can be found in the hills surrounding Henneth Annûn.\n\nEreblen has asked you to return to the sun-touched Morgul-trolls you found previously and scrape patches of moss from them.
Deliver the moss to Ereblen in Henneth Annûn
Scrape moss from sun-touched Morgul-trolls in North Ithilien ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
